owl:Ontology.dcterms:description:
The SEAS Communication ontology defines:
1. Communication devices that ca connect to exchange information, 2. Communication connections between Communication devices, where information is exchanged, and 3. Communication connection points of communication devices, through which information flows in/out the communication device.
owl:Ontology.dcterms:title: The SEAS Communication ontology

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links a communication device to another communication device it exchanges information with using the Bluetooth Low Energy protocol.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: communicates in BLE With

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links a communication device to another communication device it exchanges information with using the Bluetooth protocol.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: communicates in Bluetooth With

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links a communication device to another communication device it exchanges information with using the EnOcean protocol.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: communicates in EnOcean With

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links a communication device to another communication device it exchanges information with using the LoRa protocol.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: communicates in LoRa With

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links a communication device to another communication device it exchanges information with using Radio Waves.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: communicates in Radio With

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links a communication device to another communication device it exchanges information with using Serial protocol.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: communicates in Serial With

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links a communication device to another communication device it exchanges information with using the SigFox protocol.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: communicates in SigFox With

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links a communication device to another communication device it exchanges information with using USB protocol.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: communicates in USB With

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links a communication device to another communication device it exchanges information with using the Wifi protocol.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: communicates in Wifi With

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links a communication device to another communication device it exchanges information with using the Zig Bee protocol.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: communicates in Zig Bee With

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links a communication device to another communication device it exchanges information with using some wire.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: communicates using wire with

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links a communication device to another communication device it exchanges information with wirelessly.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: communicates wirelessly with

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment:
Links a communication device to another communication device it exchanges information with.
For example, for information to flow between a water smart meter and a smart home management system, then they must share a communication connection:
``` <waterSmartMeter> a seas:CommunicationDevice . <smartHMS> a seas:CommunicationDevice . <waterSmartMeter> seas:communicatesWith <smartHMS> . ```
This property can be further specialized to describe the communication protocol used. For example, sub property `seas:communicatesIn80211aWith` links a communication device to another communication device it exchanges information with using WiFi 802.11a norm.
This property can be qualified using class seas:CommunicationConnection, which connects (at least) the two communication systems. If there is a communication connection between several communication devices, then one may infer these communication devices can exchange information.
SEAS defines a some communicatesWith sub properties used by SEAS partners. If another user requires some addition to this list, please contact us.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: communicates with

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of BLE communication connections between communication devices.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: BLE Communication Connection

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of BLE communication connection points between communication devices.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: BLE Communication Connection Point

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of communication devices capable of communicating using the BLE protocol.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: BLE Communication Device

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of Bluetooth communication connections between communication devices.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Bluetooth Communication Connection

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of Bluetooth communication connection points between communication devices.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Bluetooth Communication Connection Point

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of communication devices capable of communicating using the Bluetooth protocol.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Bluetooth Communication Device

owl:Class.rdfs:comment:
The class of communication connections between communication devices. a communication connection describes the information flows between the communication devices it connects. For example, the following RDF graph states that a 802.11a (WiFi) connection connects two :
``` <wifi_connection_12> a seas:CommunicationConnection ; seas:connectsSystem <waterSmartMeter> , <smartHMS> . ```
Only communication devices and communication connection points are connected through a communication connection. A connection between communication devices is not necessarily a communication connection.
Any communication device that exchanges information through a communication connection is connected at least through one of its communication connection points to the communication connection: if:
``` <waterSmartMeter> a seas:CommunicationDevice . <wifi_connection_12> a seas:CommunicationConnection . <waterSmartMeter> seas:connectedThrough <wifi_connection_12> . ```
then there exists `_:communicationConnectionPoint` such that:
``` _:communicationConnectionPoint a seas:CommunicationConnectionPoint ; seas:connectionPointOf <waterSmartMeter> ; seas:connectsSystemThrough <wifi_connection_12> . ```
SEAS defines a taxonomy of communication connections used by SEAS partners. If another user requires some addition to this list, please contact us.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Communication Connection

owl:Class.rdfs:comment:
The class of communication connection points of communication devices, at which they may be connected to other systems. For example, a water smart meter may have three communication connection points: Wireless M-Bus, Zigbee and LoRa:
``` <waterSmartMeter> a seas:CommunicationDevice ; seas:connectsAt <waterSmartMeter_mbus> , <waterSmartMeter_zigbee> , <waterSmartMeter_lora> . ```
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Communication Connection Point

owl:Class.rdfs:comment:
The class of communication devices, i.e., devices that exchange information with other communication devices.
These exchange are only possible through information connections between communication devices.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Communication Device

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of EnOcean communication connections between communication devices.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: EnOcean Communication Connection

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of EnOcean communication connection points between communication devices.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: EnOcean Communication Connection Point

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of communication devices capable of communicating using the EnOcean protocol.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: EnOcean Communication Device

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of LoRa communication connections between communication devices.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: LoRa Communication Connection

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of LoRa communication connection points between communication devices.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: LoRa Communication Connection Point

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of communication devices capable of communicating using the LoRa protocol.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: LoRa Communication Device

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of radio communication connections between communication devices.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Radio Communication Connection

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of Radio communication connection points between communication devices.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Radio Communication Connection Point

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of communication devices capable of communicating using radio waves.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Radio Communication Device

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of Serial communication connections between communication devices.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Serial Communication Connection

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of Serial communication connection points between communication devices.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Serial Communication Connection Point

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of communication devices capable of communicating using the serial protocol.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Serial Communication Device

owl:Class.rdfs:label: SigFox Communication Connection

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of SigFox communication connection points between communication devices.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: SigFox Communication Connection Point

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of communication devices capable of communicating using the SigFox protocol.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: USB Communication Connection

owl:Class.rdfs:comment:
The class of communication devices capable of communicating through a wire.
SEAS defines a taxonomy of communication devices used by SEAS partners. If another user requires some addition to this list, please contact us.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Wire Communication Device
